turns.content: What is Lex Fridman known for?

Lex Fridman is a well-known computer scientist, AI researcher, and podcaster. He is a research scientist at MIT and his research interests include deep learning, computer vision, and autonomous vehicles.

Fridman is also known for hosting "The Lex Fridman Podcast," a popular long-form podcast where he interviews a wide range of guests, including scientists, philosophers, entrepreneurs, and technologists. His podcast has gained a significant following and has featured guests such as Elon Musk, Noam Chomsky, and Sam Harris.

In addition to his academic and podcasting pursuits, Fridman is also known for his advocacy for open-source software and his efforts to make AI research more accessible and understandable to the general public.
